Question: Which songs from the movie 'Bbuddah... Hoga Terra Baap' feature vocals by Amitabh Bachchan?
Options:
A. Haal-E-Dil
B. Go Meera Go
C. Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap
D. All of the above
Answer: B) Go Meera Go, C) Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap
